msContents.summary: This is a famous text in the vaiṣṇava school of philosophy. This is a single manuscript with three small texts. Numeration is continues. Front cover with title śrīmateśrīnivāsamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrī[gadya]trayaṃ The word gadya is not readable as the sticker with number 63 is glued over it. On 1r there are 4 lines written in granth script. 1r 1 śrīmate śrīnivāsamahādeśikāya namaḥ svācāramārabhya bhagavatparyantān gurūn praṇāmādibhirabhyarcya ...

TEI.text:
1v 1 lakṣmipate śra?tipateścadayaikayāmno śausāpurāsamajaniṣṭa jagat?tārthaṃ . prāpyaṃ prakāśayatu naḥ . paramaṃ
1v 2 rahasyaṃ saṃvādauṣa? śaraṇāgatimantrasāraḥ . vande vedāntakarpūra cāmīkarakaraṇḍakam rāmānujāryamāryāṇām chūḍāmaṇim 1v 3 aharnisham .. bhagavannārāyaṇābhimatānurūpasvarūpaguravibhavaiśvaryaśīlādyanavadhikātiśayā
6r 4 prāptiṣu nissamśayassukhamāsva . īti śrībhagavadrāmānujaviraci[te](tam) śaraṇāgatigadyaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ . hariḥ oṃ
6r 5 antaḥkāle smṛti? thu navakaiṃ kaśyakāritā tāmeva bhagavannadya kriyamāṇāṃ kuruṣva me .. cidacitparatatvā
6r 6 nāṃ tattvayāthārthadāyine rāmānujāya munaye namo mama garīyase .. svādhīnatrividhacetanācetanasvarūpasthiti
6r 7 pravṛttibhedaṃ kleśakarmādyaśeṣakam
7v 4 ma satyasaṃkalpa . āpatsakhakākusthaśrīmat nārāyaṇapuruṣoktamaśrīraṃganātha mamanātha namostu te namostu
7v 5 te .. iti śrīraṃganāthagadyaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ .. .. yāmunāsyasudhāṃbhodhī avagāhya yathāmati ādāya bhakti yo
7v 6 gākhyaṃ rattan sandarśayāmyahaṃ . svādhīnatrividha cetanācetana svarūpasthitipravṛttibhedaṃ kleśakarmādyaśeṣadoṣā
7v 7 saṃspṛṣṭaṃ . svābhāvikānavadhīkātiśayajñānabalaikaśvaryaviraśaktitejaḥprabhṛtyasaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇaughamahārṇavaṃ ..
11v 6 vahamātmīyaṃ śrīmatpādāravindayugalaṃ śirasikṛtaṃ dhyātvā amṛtasāgarāntanignasarvāvayavasukhamāsīta .. iti śrībhaga
11v 7 vadrāmānujaviracitaṃ śrīvaikuṇṭhagadyam saṃpūrṇaṃ .. hariḥ oṃ .. śrībhagavadrāmānujāya namaḥ .
